entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Malay Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Temperature steady near zero except near plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain this afternoon. Rain along parts of the coast this morning and early this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero except near plus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
